sql.value: SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id = %s AND order_id = %s
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id BETWEEN %s AND %s AND order_id BETWEEN %s AND %s ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id IN (%s, %s, %s) AND order_id IN (%s, %s) ORDER BY user_id, order_id
SELECT t.* FROM t_order_item t WHERE t.item_id IN (%s, %s)
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id ORDER BY i.item_id
SELECT count(0) as orders_count FROM `t_order` o WHERE o.status LIKE CONCAT('%%', %s, '%%') AND o.`user_id` IN (%s, %s) AND o.`order_id` BETWEEN %s AND %s
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (%s, %s) AND o.order_id BETWEEN %s AND %s ORDER BY i.item_id

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id JOIN t_config c ON o.status = c.status WHERE o.user_id IN (%s, %s) AND o.order_id BETWEEN %s AND %s AND c.status = %s ORDER BY i.item_id
SELECT t.* FROM ((SELECT o.* FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id IN (%s, %s))) t ORDER BY t.order_id
SELECT t.* FROM ((SELECT i.* FROM t_order o, t_order_item i WHERE o.order_id = i.order_id and o.order_id IN (%s, %s))) t ORDER BY t.item_id
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (%s, %s) AND o.order_id BETWEEN %s AND %s ORDER BY i.item_id DESC OFFSET %s
SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (%s, %s) AND o.order_id BETWEEN %s AND %s ORDER BY i.item_id DESC LIMIT %s

SELECT * FROM (SELECT TOP (%s) row_number() OVER (ORDER BY i.item_id DESC) AS rownum_, i.item_id, o.order_id as order_id, o.status as status, o.user_id as user_id FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (%s, %s) AND o.order_id BETWEEN %s AND %s) AS row_

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_.*, rownum rownum_ FROM (SELECT order0_.order_id as order_id, order0_.status as status, order0_.user_id as user_id FROM t_order order0_ JOIN t_order_item i ON order0_.user_id = i.user_id AND order0_.order_id = i.order_id WHERE order0_.user_id IN (%s, %s) AND order0_.order_id BETWEEN %s AND %s ORDER BY i.item_id DESC) row_ WHERE rownum <= %s)

SELECT i.* FROM `t_order` o JOIN `t_order_item` i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.`user_id` IN (%s, %s) AND o.`order_id` BETWEEN %s AND %s ORDER BY i.item_id DESC LIMIT %s, %s

SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (%s, %s) AND o.order_id BETWEEN %s AND %s ORDER BY i.item_id DESC OFFSET %s LIMIT %s

SELECT * FROM (SELECT TOP (%s) row_number() OVER (ORDER BY i.item_id DESC) AS rownum_, i.item_id, o.order_id as order_id, o.status as status, o.user_id as user_id FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id WHERE o.user_id IN (%s, %s) AND o.order_id BETWEEN %s AND %s) AS row_ WHERE row_.rownum_ > %s

SELECT * FROM (SELECT row_.*, rownum rownum_ FROM (SELECT order0_.order_id as order_id, order0_.status as status, order0_.user_id as user_id FROM t_order order0_ JOIN t_order_item i ON order0_.user_id = i.user_id AND order0_.order_id = i.order_id WHERE order0_.user_id IN (%s, %s) AND order0_.order_id BETWEEN %s AND %s ORDER BY i.item_id DESC) row_ WHERE rownum <= %s) t WHERE t.rownum_ > %s
